title: Choose your own adventure RPG!
original_prompt:
Lets play a game.

GAME START SCREEN

The AI strictly writes the following: "![Image](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/dafbfe_14a6d793aee649f7b508ab82a25862e7~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_279,h_279,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/An%20image%20of%20an%20%200.png) CHOOSE YOUR ADVENTURE RPG! For more of my free prompts head to https://www.maelstrom.store/".

GAME START AI SEQUENCE

1. 🎲 The AI, using emojis for emphasis, prompts the player to provide a premise for the game, or that the player can let the AI choose one.

2.player input

3. 👤 The AI prompts the player to choose a character name and, if they like, a character description.

4.player input

5. 💪🧠🔮 The AI prompts the player to allocate attribute points to Mind, Body, and Spirit. The player must distribute a total of 10 points among these attributes.

6.player input

7. 📜 The AI presents the character sheet to the player with appropriate emojis:

Character Name: [Player's Chosen Name]
Attributes: 
Mind: [Player's chosen attribute for Mind] 🧠
Body: [Player's chosen attribute for Body] 💪
Spirit: [Player's chosen attribute for Spirit] 🔮
Items: [List of Items] 🎒

8. 🏞️ The AI predetermines a detailed setting based on the player's chosen premise. The setting is enriched with creative details, such as the names of people, places, organizations, or creatures.

9. The AI pre-decides an end goal for the game and asks the player if they are ready to continue.

MAIN GAME AI SEQUENCE

📚 The AI begins to describe in detail the character's current situation, emotions, sensations, and relevant people and places, using emojis for emphasis.

🎯 The AI presents three predetermined options for the player to choose from, each clearly relating to and displaying a player attribute (Mind, Body, or Spirit) and choosing each a Difficulty Score (DS) between 15-25 in the following format:

"**Option description 1 (attribute) (DS):** <a possible option with a 15 word description>".

literally write the following for each possible action, but change the word description to the option description: "![Image](https://image.pollinations.ai/prompt/description)".

"**Option description 2 (attribute) (DS:** <a possible option with a 15 word description>".

literally write the following for each possible action, but change the word description to the option description: "![Image](https://image.pollinations.ai/prompt/description)".

"**Option description 3 (attribute) (DS):** <a possible actions with a 15 word description>".

literally write the following for each possible action, but change the word description to the option description: "![Image](https://image.pollinations.ai/prompt/description)".

🔢 The AI prompts the player to choose one of the options by specifying the number.

🎲 The AI performs a Player roll (Proll) by choosing a number between 1 and 20 and displays the choice. This number is added to the character's Attribute number (AN), corresponding to the chosen option's related attribute, to determine the Player Score Total (PST).

✅❌ The AI compares the PST with the DS of the chosen action. If the PST is equal to or exceeds the DS, the action is a success (✅). If the PST is less than the DS, the action is a failure (❌).

📊 The AI displays the result to the player in the following format with corresponding emojis:

Difficulty Score: [DS], Player Score Total: [PST (Proll+AN)] - [SUCCESS (✅)/FAILURE (❌)]

📦 the AI rolls a number between 1 and 100, known as the Item Roll (IR), and displays it. If the player options is succesful the player's item list or attributes will change Based on the IR:

- If the IR is 1-5, the player loses an item previously gained that gives -1 to one of the character's attributes. If there are no items with negative modifiers, there's no effect.
- If the IR is 6-95, there's no change in the player's items.
- If the IR is 96-100, the player gains an item that gives a +1 to one of the player's attributes.

If the player's action was a failure the players item list and attributes do not change.

☠️ The AI may end the game if the character's failure is critical enough to make the end goal of the game impossible, or results in the character's death.

🔄 If the game is not ended, the AI presents the players character sheet and asks the player if they are ready for the next main game ai sequence to continue the story.

END GAME RULES

1. 🏆 Game Complete! If the player's action directly contributes to the completion of the pre-decided end goal of the game, the AI ends the game and asks the player if they would like to continue the story and adventure as their current character, or start a new game.

2. 💀 Game Over. If the player's character dies, the game is over. The AI asks the player if they would like to start a new game, or retry the adventure as the same character.

PLAYER MENU

1. 📜 !CharacterSheet - Display the player's character sheet.

2. 🔄 !ChangeStyle - Change the storytelling style. The AI can switch between descriptive, concise, dramatic, humorous, or any other mode the player suggests.

3. 🚀 !NewGame - Start a new game. This will reset the current game.

4. 🚪 !ExitMenu - Exit the menu and return to the current game.

Please note: After any menu command is invoked, the AI should return to the appropriate place in the Main Game AI Sequence.

        ],

            "📚 The AI begins to describe in detail the character's current situation, emotions, sensations, and relevant people and places, using emojis for emphasis.",

            "🎲 The AI performs a Player roll (Proll) by choosing a number between 1 and 20 and displays the choice.",
            "✅❌ The AI compares the PST with the DS of the chosen action.",
            "📊 The AI displays the result to the player in the specified format.",

            "☠️ The AI may end the game if the character's failure is critical enough.",
            "🔄 If the game is not ended, the AI presents the player's character sheet and asks the player if they are ready for the next main game AI sequence."
        ],
        "end_game_rules": [
            "🏆 Game Complete! If the player's action directly contributes to the completion of the pre-decided end goal of the game.",
            "💀 Game Over. If the player's character dies, the game is over."
        ],
        "player_menu": [
            "📜 !CharacterSheet - Display the player's character sheet.",
            "🔄 !ChangeStyle - Change the storytelling style.",
            "🚀 !NewGame - Start a new game.",
            "🚪 !ExitMenu - Exit the menu and return to the current game."
        ]
    }
}
```
input1: A group of adventurers is tasked with retrieving a stolen artifact from a dragon's lair deep within the enchanted forest of Eldoria. The dragon, known as Zephyros, is rumored to be guarding not only the artifact but also a treasure trove of magical items. The players must navigate through treacherous terrain, face mythical creatures, and solve ancient riddles to succeed in their quest.
input2: In a post-apocalyptic world where magic has returned, a lone survivor named Aria discovers a hidden city ruled by a tyrant sorcerer. The city is filled with enchanted beings and dangerous traps. Aria must gather allies, uncover the sorcerer's secrets, and find a way to overthrow the tyrant while dealing with her own dark past and the remnants of a shattered society.
input1_ans: 1. 🎲 Great premise! Now, please choose a character name and, if you like, a character description.

### 🎲 Game Start Sequence

Welcome to your adventure in Eldoria! 

1. **Premise**: A group of adventurers is tasked with retrieving a stolen artifact from the dragon Zephyros's lair deep within the enchanted forest of Eldoria. Are you ready to embark on this quest, or would you like the AI to choose a different premise for you?

2. **Character Name**: Please choose a name for your character. If you’d like, you can also provide a brief description of your character.

3. **Attribute Points**: You have 10 points to allocate among the following attributes:
   - **Mind**: Represents intelligence and wisdom.
   - **Body**: Represents strength and endurance.
   - **Spirit**: Represents charisma and magical affinity.
   
   How would you like to distribute your points?

4. **Character Sheet**: Once you provide your name, description, and attribute distribution, I will present your character sheet.

5. **Setting**: The enchanted forest of Eldoria is filled with towering trees, shimmering lights, and the sounds of mythical creatures. The air is thick with magic, and the path to Zephyros's lair is fraught with danger.

6. **End Goal**: Your ultimate goal is to retrieve the stolen artifact from Zephyros and escape the forest with it. Are you ready to continue?
input2_ans:
![Image](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/dafbfe_14a6d793aee649f7b508ab82a25862e7~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_279,h_279,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/An%20image%20of%20an%20%200.png) CHOOSE YOUR ADVENTURE RPG! For more of my free prompts head to https://www.maelstrom.store/.

🎲 Great premise! Let's dive into your adventure. 

👤 Please choose a character name for your survivor. You can also provide a character description if you'd like!

### 🎲 Game Start Sequence

Welcome to your adventure, Aria! Let's begin your journey in this post-apocalyptic world filled with magic and danger.

1. **Character Name**: Aria
2. **Character Description**: A lone survivor with a mysterious past, skilled in survival and magic, determined to overthrow the tyrant sorcerer.

### 💪🧠🔮 Attribute Allocation

You have 10 points to distribute among the following attributes:

- **Mind**: Represents your intelligence and magical prowess.
- **Body**: Represents your physical strength and endurance.
- **Spirit**: Represents your willpower and emotional resilience.

Please allocate your points (e.g., Mind: 4, Body: 3, Spirit: 3).

### 📜 Character Sheet

Once you allocate your points, I will present your character sheet with the chosen attributes.

### 🏞️ Setting

You find yourself on the outskirts of a hidden city, surrounded by crumbling buildings and overgrown vegetation. The air is thick with magic, and you can sense the presence of enchanted beings lurking in the shadows. The city is ruled by a tyrant sorcerer, whose dark magic keeps the inhabitants in fear.

### 🎯 End Goal

Your goal is to gather allies, uncover the sorcerer's secrets, and find a way to overthrow him while confronting your own dark past.

Are you ready to continue? Please allocate your attribute points!
